Sentencas: This paper presents exergy analysis of a conceptualized combined cogeneration plant that employs pressurized oxygen blown coal gasifier and high-temperature, high-pressure solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) in the topping cycle and a bottoming steam cogeneration cycle.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Useful heat is supplied by the pass-out steam from the steam turbine and also by the steam raised separately in an evaporator placed in the heat recovery steam generator (HRSG).
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Exergy analysis shows that major part of plant exergy destruction takes place in gasifier and SOFC while considerable losses are also attributed to gas cooler, combustion chamber and HRSG.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Exergy losses are found to decrease with increasing pressure ratio across the gas turbine for all of these components except the gas cooler.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The fuel cell operating temperature influences the performance of the equipment placed downstream of SOFC.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell
Exergy analysis of a cogeneration plant using coal gasification and solid oxide fuel cell
